item.title: CVE-2023-2782|2023-05-18T10:16:55.735Z -- acronis -- acronis%20cyber%20infrastructure
item.description: Sensitive information disclosure due to improper authorization. The following products are affected: Acronis Cyber Infrastructure (ACI) before build 5.3.1-38.

item.title: CVE-2023-2360|2023-04-28T11:10:46.100Z -- acronis -- acronis%20cyber%20infrastructure
item.description: Sensitive information disclosure due to CORS misconfiguration. The following products are affected: Acronis Cyber Infrastructure (ACI) before build 5.2.0-135.
